About Me

Here are a few facts about me..

Born on Friday, 1st of March 1968 in Bauchi, I started my early education at Fatima private primary school Jos in the then - Plateau. I completed my primary school education at Demonstration primary school in Markudi Benue state; later attended St Francis secondary school in Otukpo Benue state. My tertiary education saw me through the university of Agriculture Makurdi from where I bagged a bachelor's degree (B.Eng) in Agricultural Engineering. I went further to acquire a Master's degree (M.Eng) in production management and optimization. I joined the National Youth Service Corps in 1998 as an inspector 1 and has risen through the ranks through hardwork, discipline, mental focus, and great presence of mind. I am currently assistant director handling the deployment and relocation branch in NYSC secretariat Enugu. I'm happily married with 2 kids, and my hobbies include basketball, movies, chess, reading, and writing.
